page.title: 13Mobile Trade in Fenton area
page.content: The area is served by two mobile shops, one sells a variety of groceries, both fresh and packaged. The other sells all kinds of meat, bread and cakes from a butcher/baker in Lincoln. This van visits the villages twice a week, stopping at convenient points. Fresh fish is brought from Grimsby once a week for villagers to purchase. About seventy-five percent of the villagers, both young and old, use these services. The following are average prices of weekly groceries: A loaf of bread 40p, a pint of milk 23p, a dozen eggs 80p, Cod and Haddock Â£1.20 per lb.,Pork chops Â£1.38p per lb, leg of Lamb Â£1.40 per lb., roasting Beef Â£1.80 per lb., Sirloin steak Â£2.98 per lb., and frozen Chicken 59p per lb..
